summary.para: Contains the classes for LINQ to XML. LINQ to XML is an in-memory XML programming interface that enables you to modify XML documents efficiently and easily.

remarks.para: Using LINQ to XML, you can:

item.para: Load XML from files or streams.
Serialize XML to files or streams.
Create XML trees from scratch using functional construction.
Query XML trees using LINQ queries.
Use a combination of these features to transform XML trees from one shape into another.
